summary: In the summer of 1978, a teenager and his group of friends face new challenges when their neighborhood roller-skating rink closes, forcing them to visit a different rink.
cast: Shad Moss|Brandon T. Jackson|Chi McBride|Marcus T. Paulk|Rick Gonzalez|Khleo Thomas|Busisiwe Irvin|Jurnee Smollett|Kellita Smith|Mike Epps|Charlie Murphy|Meagan Good|Nick Cannon|Wesley Jonathan|Paul Wesley|Daniel Yabut|Wayne Brady|Darryl McDaniels|Joseph Hansa|Kat Tuohy|Marcia Wright|Cassandra Lewis|Deanna Reed-Foster|Mark Simmons|Ernest Perry Jr.|Tim Kazurinsky|Heather O'Brien|Kelly Jay|Samirah Garnett|Damon Williams|Norman Vance III|Tammy Fey|Tai Davis|Tina Au|Todd Donoho|Booker T. title: Sobre ruedas
